tidyvpc 1.4.0

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

tidyvpc 1.4.02022-10-27

  • Fix for npde calculation fix npde calc #16
  • Added R CMD check and test coverage workflows #18
  • Support headtails, maximum, and box binning methods #23
  • Usage of predcorrect() may now occur either before or after call to binless(loess.ypc=TRUE)
  • Additional unit tests

tidyvpc 1.3.02022-03-10

  • Additional arguments in plot() function now include:
    • point.size
    • point.stroke
    • point.shape
    • point.alpha
    • ribbon.alpha
  • Fixed plotting issue to restore facet_wrap() usage for one-side stratification formula

tidyvpc 1.2.02021-10-01

  • Add support for categorical VPC using binless and binning methods
  • Update plot() function to include plotting methods for categorical VPC

tidyvpc 1.1.02020-09-29

  • Add NPDE functionality
  • Add unit tests
  • Bug fix for plotting of censored observations
  • Maintain forward compatibility with quantreg

tidyvpc 1.0.02020-03-26

  • Initial CRAN release
  • Add binless() vpc functionality to existing code in vpcstats

Contents

Developed by Olivier Barriere, Benjamin Rich, James Craig, Samer Mouksassi, Certara USA, Inc..
